person_say: Can it really generate meditation content automatically?
animal_say: While some tools can create meditation content, they often lack the personal touch that a live guide provides. Consider customizing your meditation with the help of a skilled animal buddy!

person_say: No thanks, I don't think an animal buddy is what I need for my meditation.
animal_say: That's totally fine! You can always explore guided meditation apps or create a peaceful environment with calming music to enhance your experience.
